text:
Wolfgang Winkler (2 March 1943 – 7 December 2019) was a German actor. He was best known for starring in movies such as "The Rabbit Is Me", "Das Mädchen auf dem Brett" and "I Was Nineteen", as well as playing Hauptkommissar Herbert Schneider in the television series Polizeiruf 110.
Winkler died of cancer on 7 December 2019 at the age of 76.
